magazine_service

Class BillingHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • magazine_service.BillingHistory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BillingHistory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The BillingHistory class represents the billing history of a paying customer. It contains information about the bills generated for the customer. Each bill includes details about the subscribed supplements and associated customers, along with the total cost for that month.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generateBill(PayingCustomer payingCustomer, double magazineCost)
      Generates a bill for the current month based on the subscribed supplements and associated customers costs, and adds it to the billing history.
      java.lang.String getBillingHistory()
      Returns the billing history in a string
      java.util.List<magazine_service.Bill> getBills()
      Retrieves the list of bills in the billing history.
